job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ALLOYs engineering team provides software development and technical expertise to solve practical realworld problems and build highend worldclass customer experiences We maintain existing products architect new ones estimate effort and provide informed opinions around whats possible reasonable and feasible We strive to incorporate more DevOps practices into our work every day and to continually leverage the latest cloud computing services Our engineers are fearless aggressive makers and problem solvers We love to combine talents to overcome the obstacles that strike fear in the hearts of most shops We learn something new every day and never shy away from conversations music recommendations or new ideasbrbrstronguWhat You Will DobrustrongulliDevelop and enhance a suite of applications written in C and SQL Server hosted in AWSliliImplement new features and bug fixes and support them through testing and deploymentliliMigrate legacy server based applications onto serverless platforms and managed servicesliliResearch and pinpoint issues in complex systems with lots of moving piecesliliDevelop CICD pipelines and automated tests to ensure your applications are always in a deployable statebrliulstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongstrongWhat we definitely need brstrongulliTakes pride in writing clean elegant codeliliKnowledgeable of modern software platforms patterns and practicesliliStrong understanding of web protocols such as TCP HTTP and RESTliliDetail orientedliliAble to explain complex concepts in simple termsliliAbility and desire to quickly learn new technologyliliStrong troubleshootingdebugging skillsliliCliliASPNET MVCliliJavascript frameworks such as Nodejs React and VueliliEntity FrameworkDapperliliSQL ServerliliAWSliliGitbrliulstrongNice to haves brstrongulliBachelor of Science in CS or MIS preferredliliSQLNETAWS certification is a plusliliExperience with Agile and Scrum methodology best practicesliul
